Name: GAMECINE VR
About the game: FEATURES & CONTENT Short interactable movies in virtual reality Each level, a different universe The audience in your living room will watch you play in both first and third person camera From calm to insane, from dinosaurs to aliens! Cinematic shots and subtitles included A new movie every month GAMECINE uses both seated and standing modes in VR.
